items.question: What is Text-to-Video?
items.answer: Text-to-Video is an AI technology that converts written text descriptions into dynamic video content. Simply describe the scene, characters, actions, and style you want, and the AI will generate a corresponding video.

items.question: What visual styles are supported?
items.answer: We support multiple visual styles including realistic, anime, watercolor, cyberpunk, oil painting, 3D animation, and more. You can specify your preferred style in the text prompt.

items.question: What video resolutions are available?
items.answer: We support 1080p Full HD and 2K ultra-clear output resolutions. The advanced AI technology eliminates common issues like jitter, blur, and artifacts.

items.question: How long can generated videos be?
items.answer: Generated videos can be over 30 seconds in length while maintaining consistent scene quality and character coherence.

items.question: How detailed should my text prompts be?
items.answer: The more detailed your prompts, the better the results. Include descriptions of characters, settings, actions, lighting, camera angles, and artistic style. However, even simple prompts can produce impressive results.

items.question: Can I control camera movements?
items.answer: Yes! You can specify camera movements, angles, zooms, pans, and transitions in your text prompts. The AI will incorporate these directions into the generated video.
